question: Which companies have emerged as leaders in adopting artificial intelligence technologies following recent leadership changes?

subtasks.task: Identify companies that have undergone recent leadership changes. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
Gather data on the adoption of artificial intelligence technologies by these companies. [CompanyTechStack]
